nodes.text: Sohli bark was a type of edible brown bark that contained essential vitamins and minerals. The exiled Jedi Master Yoda collected it in the areas surrounding his home in Dragonsnake Bog on the swamp-covered planet Dagobah.
Sohli bark was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations, in a section written by James Luceno.
